title: Sewer Smoke Testing
description: A wastewater crew is conducting smoke testing to find sources of rainwater inflow and infiltration into the sewer system.

tasks.description: Notify residents in the test area that they may see non-toxic smoke coming from manholes or their roof vents.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates and distributes door-hanger notifications.

tasks.description: The crew pumps smoke into the sewer system through a manhole.
tasks.expected_outcome: Crew follows the standard procedure for smoke testing.

tasks.description: The crew observes where the smoke escapes (e.g., from a storm drain catch basin) and logs these locations as sources of illegal connections.
tasks.expected_outcome: Crew documents the locations of inflow sources with GPS coordinates and photos.
